__e: You made Brett quit the choir, and now we have zero chance of winning.
And Brett has been, like, the greatest husband ever.
And it didn't occur to you, after ten months, that maybe something had happened to Brett?
Oh, please, Brett! You're not even from this country. Stay the hell out of it.
Well, Brett's memory isn't what it used to be.
See, The Thing Of It Is, Brett... There Hasn't Been A Day Go By In The Last Ten Years I Didn't Wanna Punch Nick Garrett Square In The Face.
It's only been two years since Brett said, "I love you."
But when I told Brett, he said we still had to be the point of contact, had to.
Now... Now I know where you are, and Brett made it clear how he feels about you, and the last thing I want to do is get in the middle of anything.
